name: URL

constructors.name: Url
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the URL class using the specified string representation of the URL.

params.name: spec
params.description: The string to parse as a URL.

constructors.name: Url
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the URL class by parsing the specified spec within the specified context.

params.name: spec
params.description: The context in which to parse the specification. The string to parse as a URL.

constructors.name: Url
constructors.signature: public Url(String protocol, String host, String file)
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the URL class using the specified protocol, host, and  file on the host. The default port for the specified protocol is used.

params.name: file
params.description: The protocol name for this URL. The host name for this URL. The file name for this URL.

constructors.name: Url
constructors.signature: public Url(String protocol, String host, Integer port, String file)
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the URL class using the specified protocol, host, port, and file on the host.

params.name: file
params.description: The protocol name for this URL. The host name for this URL. The port number for this URL. The file name for this URL.

methods.name: getAuthority
methods.description: Returns the authority portion of the current URL.

methods.name: getCurrentRequestUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL of an entire request on a Salesforce instance.

methods.name: getDefaultPort
methods.description: Returns the default port number of the protocol associated with the current URL.

methods.name: getFile
methods.description: Returns the file name of the current URL.

methods.name: getFileFieldURL
methods.signature: public static String getFileFieldURL(String entityId, String fieldName)
methods.description: Returns the download URL for a file attachment.

params.name: fieldName
params.description: Specifies the ID of the entity that holds the file data. Specifies the API name of a file field component, such as AttachmentBody.

methods.name: getHost
methods.description: Returns the host name of the current URL.

methods.name: getOrgDomainUrl
methods.description: Returns the canonical URL for your org. For example, https://yourDomain.my.salesforce.com or, for orgs without My Domain enabled, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com.

methods.name: getPath
methods.description: Returns the path portion of the current URL.

methods.name: getPort
methods.description: Returns the port of the current URL.

methods.name: getProtocol
methods.description: Returns the protocol name of the current URL, such as, https.

methods.name: getQuery
methods.description: Returns the query portion of the current URL.

methods.name: getRef
methods.description: Returns the anchor of the current URL.

methods.name: getSalesforceBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL of the Salesforce instance.

methods.name: getUserInfo
methods.description: Gets the UserInfo portion of the current URL.

methods.name: sameFile
methods.description: Compares the current URL with the specified URL object, excluding the fragment component.

methods.name: toExternalForm
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the current URL.

description: Represents a uniform resource locator (URL) and provides access to parts of the URL. Enables access to the Salesforce instance URL.
